title: 求救！1.7.10工业服务器，玩家莫名掉线
author: Assassins571
txt_content:
07.06 10:11:13 [Server] INFO java.nio.channels.ClosedChannelException
07.06 10:11:13 [Server] WARN An exceptionCaught() event was fired, and it reached at the tail of the pipeline. It usually means the last handler in the pipeline did not handle the exception.
07.06 10:11:12 [Server] INFO java.nio.channels.ClosedChannelException
07.06 10:11:12 [Server] WARN An exceptionCaught() event was fired, and it reached at the tail of the pipeline. It usually means the last handler in the pipeline did not handle the exception.
07.06 10:10:09 [Server] INFO java.nio.channels.ClosedChannelException
07.06 10:10:09 [Server] WARN An exceptionCaught() event was fired, and it reached at the tail of the pipeline. It usually means the last handler in the pipeline did not handle the exception.


所有的报错

replies.author: hushao
replies.txt_content: 其实    你可以修复 或者你的文件出错 了   重新下载  要不然你就表玩了-  -

replies.txt_content: 可能是你的经济插件编码有问题吧
